pair.setup_intro: To let Homey talk with your Nefit Easy we need some more information.
pair.setup_failed: Homey couldn't find your Nefit Easy, or this device is already added, please make sure the entered credentials are correct and try again.
pair.setup_failed_hint: Hint: if you don't remember your credentials, check the front cover of your Nefit Easy manual.
pair.setup_succeeded: Your Nefit Easy was successfully added!

not_reachable: This device could not be reached
